comment: Shared this in Iowa and Kentucky with friends. No one turned down a follow on pour.
I liked this more than their young moonshine
Mellow nutmeg and spice. Would be nice in winter.
High rye. Nutmeg, oak, char on the nose. Light vanilla, light sweetness. A bit bitter neat. Not the best.
Smooth syrupy sipper. Hints of caramel and loves a single cube. As good as the town it’s from.
